body:
So this game is simple


give the person above you a fortune

Nothing Disrespectful (you will get killed in 1 hour)


Example:
Me: made the forum post
some guy: you will win the lottery when you are 21 years old
some other guy: you will beat the next game you play in 1 hour 


have fun

title: [Game] Fortune Teller

replies.body: You are going to see a flying banana in your window tomorrow.
replies.body_tagged: You are going to see a flying banana in your window tomorrow.

replies.body: You are going to see a professor tomorrow at your house, his name is ProfessorUtonium xD :)
